TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that login functionality is working as expected.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter username.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter username.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter username.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter password.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter password.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter password.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Login button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Login button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Login button.
